projects.name: Marquis
projects.desc:
Marquis is a new approach on how cars dealers can manage their fleets across their dealerships.
Through our website or our mobile apps, anyone can get informations on vehicles, their locations, ...

projects.name: Twalk
projects.desc:
Twalk is a podcast app to listen, react and publish easily audio content, like streetcasts
(Podcast recorded in the street while walking).
Check out my podcasts on Soundcloud about its development.
